index_texte1:
Hello,

For a meeting with friends, a reunion, a party, or for any other occasion, do business with our catering service "La Bonne Cuisine". At your service for over 15 years, our staff will be able to meet your needs.

For any comments, questions or suggestions, write to us at the following address info@labonnecuisine.com
menu_texte: P.S. The amount in USD currency is for information purposes only. It will be calculated at the daily rate when the order is validated and placed
connexion_erreurConnexion: The email or password is invalid
connexion_succes:
Email sent!

An email has been sent to you to reset your password.
connexion_echec:
Oops!!

You are not a user of our platform!
commande_succes:
We have received your order.
Your package will be delivered to you as soon as possible.
Thank you for trusting us!
commande_prixTotal: The amount of your invoice (taxes included):
commande_avis: Warning, $1/person will be added to the invoice for groups of less than 10 people.
email_intro:
Hello,

Thank you for ordering from our catering service 'La Bonne Cuisine'. Our staff is working hard to prepare your order to your satisfaction.
email_description: Here is the description of your order:
email_contact: A representative will contact you as soon as possible.
email_conclusion:
See you soon!

The team at La Bonne Cuisine
email_mdp_intro:
Hello,

You have requested to reset your password.
email_mdp_lien:

{lien}
email_mdp_expiration: p.s. You have 5 minutes to complete this action. After that, you will need to request a new link.
email_mdp_ignore: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
email_mdp_conclusion:
Best regards,
The La Bonne Cuisine Team
